title: Hong Kong Police Arrest Five Over Children’s Books Depicting Protesters as Sheep
content:
1. Hong Kong Police Arrest Five Over Children’s Books Depicting Protesters as Sheep  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Hong Kong: five arrested for sedition over children's book about sheep  Guardian News
  3. Hong Kong police arrest union members for 'seditious' children's books  NBC News
  4. Five arrested in Hong Kong over children's books  Reuters
  5. Hong Kong police say children's tales of sheep and wolves incite sedition  New York Post
